nodes.text: The Sport's Greatest Rivalry was a podracing poster by Codenka Mafurias. It depicted the rivalry between Sebulba and Ben Quadinaros, two Podracers active during the last decades of the Galactic Republic. At the time of the Clone Wars, the Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker owned a copy of that poster, which he kept in his quarters at the Jedi Temple.
